comments:
Build: 3.1 M7

I clicked Project > Generate Javadoc entirely by accident. I probably haven't
tried running this in a long time (using same workspace).  I found an error like
this in my log file for each closed project in my workspace.  It looks like it
isn't correctly handling closed projects:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 10001 2005-05-16 16:09:22.413
